messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] monkey platter
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks !! ************************************** This is a phrase I use for finger food for kids. The story of it is here because I think I must ve written it
messages.messageBody:
Thanks !!
**************************************

This is a phrase I use for finger food for kids.

The story of it is here because I think I must've written it up a dozen times
over the years and never thought to save one.

http://sandradodd.com/eating/monkeyplatter

and it's linked from the food page which anyone with food questions or issues
might want to look at
http://sandradodd.com/food


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
